## GeoBox.fromCoordinates() method

Returns a `GeoBox` with the given geo coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static fromCoordinates(southWest: GeoCoordinates, northEast: GeoCoordinates): GeoBox;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  southWest | [GeoCoordinates](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.md) | The south west position in geo coordinates. |
|  northEast | [GeoCoordinates](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.md) | The north east position in geo coordinates. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[GeoBox](./harp-geoutils.geobox.md)
